options: Debit card is for online shopping only
Credit card is linked to a bank account

questions.question: How can you increase your credit score?
What is compound interest?
options: Interest calculated on the initial principal
Interest calculated on the accumulated interest
questions.correctAnswer: Interest calculated on the accumulated interest

questions.question: What is the purpose of insurance?
options: To get discounts on medical bills

questions.question: What is a 401(k) retirement plan?
How does inflation affect purchasing power?

What is the purpose of a Roth IRA?
options: Tax-free growth and withdrawals in retirement
questions.correctAnswer: Tax-free growth and withdrawals in retirement

questions.question: What is a mutual fund?
options: A pool of money from many investors
questions.correctAnswer: A pool of money from many investors

questions.question: How can you reduce your debt?
options: Ignore it and hope it goes away
Create a budget and prioritize payments
questions.correctAnswer: Create a budget and prioritize payments

questions.question: What is the purpose of a will?
What is the difference between a stock and a bond?
options: Stock represents ownership in a company
Bond is a type of loan

questions.question: What is the concept of 'opportunity cost'?
options: The value of the next best alternative
questions.correctAnswer: The value of the next best alternative

questions.question: How does diversification reduce investment risk?
options: By concentrating investments in a single asset
By spreading investments across different assets
questions.correctAnswer: By spreading investments across different assets

questions.question: What is the purpose of a financial advisor?
What is the concept of 'net worth'?
options: The total value of assets minus liabilities
The total income earned in a year
The total savings in a bank account
questions.correctAnswer: The total value of assets minus liabilities

questions.question: What is the concept of 'compounding' in finance?
options: Earning interest on the initial principal
Reinvesting earnings to earn more in the future
questions.correctAnswer: Reinvesting earnings to earn more in the future

options: Determining eligibility for loans and credit cards

options: Ability to buy and sell assets easily
questions.correctAnswer: Ability to buy and sell assets easily

options: To protect investors and maintain fair markets
questions.correctAnswer: To protect investors and maintain fair markets

questions.question: What is the concept of 'dollar-cost averaging' in investing?
options: Buying more shares when prices are low and fewer when prices are high
questions.correctAnswer: Buying more shares when prices are low and fewer when prices are high

questions.question: How does a stock split affect the number of shares an investor holds?
options: No impact on the number of shares

options: Diversifying investments across different asset classes
Concentrating all investments in a single asset class
questions.correctAnswer: Diversifying investments across different asset classes

options: To provide information on credit card rewards
To help individuals manage debt and improve credit
questions.correctAnswer: To help individuals manage debt and improve credit
